content: Get free access to enterprise-ready office suite for 30 days

comment.text: This translation key is used for a banner header that offers free access to an enterprise office suite for 30 days. It appears as a banner or dialog that prompts users to activate their trial license. Translators should focus on localizing the promotional phrase "Get [free] access" while maintaining the tone and style of the original content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enterprise-ready' is not accurately conveyed by 'جاهزة للمؤسسات'. While technically correct, it lacks the nuance of being designed *for* enterprises. A more accurate translation might emphasize readiness for enterprise use.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: احصل على وصول مجاني إلى مجموعة المكاتب المصممة خصيصًا للاستخدام المؤسسي لمدة 30 يومًا

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation lacks proper spacing around punctuation, which can improve readability. Specifically, there should be a space after the exclamation point if it were included.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: احصل على وصول مجاني إلى مجموعة المكاتب المصممة خصيصًا للاستخدام المؤسسي لمدة 30 يومًا.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'enterprise-ready' is not accurately conveyed by 'prête à l'emploi'. 'Enterprise-ready' implies a level of functionality and features suitable for businesses, which 'prête à l'emploi' (ready to use) doesn't fully capture. A more suitable translation would incorporate this aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obtenez un accès gratuit à la suite bureautique pour entreprises pendant 30 jours

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English sentence uses sentence case. The French translation starts with a capital letter, which is more common for titles but less appropriate for a banner header. Although not a major issue, consistency with the English is desirable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: obtenez un accès gratuit à la suite bureautique pour entreprises pendant 30 jours

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'enterprise' is transliterated rather than translated. While understandable, it's not the most natural Armenian phrasing for this context. It should be something like 'տնտեսական մեծածառ'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'enterprise' with 'տնտեսական մեծածառ' or a similar appropriate term conveying the business-oriented aspect.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The addition of 'кроме sr' at the end of the translated text is unexpected and appears to be an error.  It's not part of the intended translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'кроме sr' from the end of the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'Ստացեք անվճար մուտք դեպի' can be improved for fluency. It's a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'ստացեք անվճար մուտք ունեցեք' or 'ստացեք անվճար մուտքի իրավունք' depending on the desired level of formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ຮັບ​ຟັງ​ຂໍ້​ສະ ເໜີ ນຳ້ ຂອງ​ການ​ໃຊ້​ງານ​ຟຣີ ຂອງ​ໂອກາດ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ງານ​ບໍ ລິ ຫານ​ທີ່​ພ້ອມ​ໃຊ້ງານ​ເປັນ​ເວລາ 30 ມື້" is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally. The phrase 'ໂອກາດ​ການ​ເຮັດ​ງານ​ບໍ ລິ ຫານ' (opportunity for administration work) is not the most appropriate translation for 'enterprise-ready office suite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation that focuses on the benefit of a professional office suite, such as: 'ເພີດເພີນກັບການໃຊ້ງານຊຸດໂຮງງານອຸດສາຫະກຳຢ່າງເຕັມສ່ວນເປັນເວລາ 30 ມື້' (Enjoy the full use of an industrial suite for 30 days) or 'ໃຊ້ງານຊຸດຄຸ້ມຄອງຢ່າງມື້ອອກອາທິດເປັນເວລາ 30 ມື້' (Use a management suite professionally for 30 days).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of space before and after Lao words needs review to ensure consistency and readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure proper spacing is used throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Obtenha' (obtain) is a bit formal and less natural in this context. 'Tenha' (have) would be more conversational and appropriate for a promotional banner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tenha acesso gratuito ao pacote de escritório pronto para empresas por 30 dias

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Obțineți 30 zile de acces la suită de birou destinată intreprinderilor' is not a direct and accurate translation of 'Get free access to enterprise-ready office suite for 30 days'. It misses the 'free' aspect and the phrasing is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Obțineți 30 de zile de acces gratuit la o suită de birou pentru întreprinderi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '30 zile' should ideally be '30 de zile' to adhere to Romanian grammatical rules regarding noun declension.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 30 de zile

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ව්‍යවසාය-සූදානම් කාර්යාල කට්ටලයකට' (vyavasaya-sudanam karyaalakataṭayakaṭa) while literally meaning 'enterprise-ready office suite', is a bit clunky and could be more naturally phrased.  A more fluent translation might prioritize conveying the core meaning of 'enterprise-ready'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like 'විශේෂිත ව්‍යාපාර කාර්යාල මෙවලි' (vīshēṣiṭha vyāpāra kāryāla mēvalī) which translates to 'specialized business tools'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses a sentence structure which might be more suitable for a spoken message than a banner header. Banner headers are typically shorter and more impactful.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider shortening the translation to focus on the key message, e.g., '30 දිනක් සඳහා ව්‍යාපාර කාර්යාල මෙවලි නොමිලේ' (30 dinak sarakā vyāpāra kāryāla mēvalī nominalē)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pripravljenega za podjetja" is a literal translation of 'enterprise-ready' but sounds awkward in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would be 'za poslovno uporabo' or 'za poslovne potrebe'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zagotovi si brezplačen dostop do pisarniškega paketa za poslovno uporabo za 30 dni

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Добијте бесплатни приступ напредних функција на 30 дана" doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Get free access to enterprise-ready office suite for 30 days'.  'Напредних функција' (advanced features) is too generic. It doesn't specify it's an 'office suite'. Also, the phrase 'enterprise-ready' is not conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добијте бесплатан приступ професионалном пакету канцеларијских апликација на 30 дана

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a full stop at the end of the sentence. It's better to use a dash to indicate 'for 30 days'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Добијте бесплатан приступ професионалном пакету канцеларијских апликација на 30 дана-

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Dobijte besplatni pristup naprednih funkcija na 30 dana' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Get free access to enterprise-ready office suite for 30 days'. 'Naprednih funkcija' translates to 'advanced features,' but the original refers to an 'enterprise-ready office suite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Dobijte besplatan pristup profesionalnom paketu uredskog softvera na 30 dana

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation lacks the specific timeframe and phrasing of 'for 30 days'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the phrase 'na 30 dana' is consistent with the English 'for 30 days' in terms of placement and clarity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kurumsal kullanıma hazır ofis paketine 30 gün boyunca ücretsiz erişim elde edin' is a bit literal and sounds somewhat formal for a promotional banner. 'Elde edin' is not the most natural phrasing in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kurumsal ofis paketine 30 gün ücretsiz erişim imkanı!

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a single long sentence, which might not be ideal for a banner. Breaking it up could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kurumsal ofis paketine erişin! 30 gün ücretsiz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Được sử dụng miễn phí bộ phần mềm văn phòng dành cho doanh nghiệp trong 30 ngày" doesn't fully convey the meaning of "Get free access to enterprise-ready office suite for 30 days". "Được sử dụng" implies being *allowed* to use, whereas the English implies gaining access. The emphasis on 'enterprise-ready' is also lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hãy trải nghiệm bộ phần mềm văn phòng dành cho doanh nghiệp miễn phí trong 30 ngày

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggested correction includes an imperative verb. It is worth considering whether a more passive construction would be more appropriate based on the overall tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn được trải nghiệm bộ phần mềm văn phòng dành cho doanh nghiệp miễn phí trong 30 ngày
